title: Video: Pacific Air – Float
content:
Having ‘grown-up’ through some of the slickest music blogs (CitR included… arrogance unintended), KO KO, now known as Pacific Air, are rapidly gathering a decent sized fanbase.

New single Float, taken from the Long Live KoKo EP, comes with a video that’s fitting to their sound; vibrant, sensual and colourful… there’s also plenty of scantily-clad attractive young woman which never goes amiss. Check out one of the best pop songs of last year below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
